description:
本課程為 Maya 運用之基礎課程，指導學生將二維的角色設計稿製作成三維的立體模型，並能夠由動畫師使用在動畫製作中。除了角色設計與軟體運用的基礎課程外，亦包含對生物肌肉與骨架的理解以及3D拓樸的知識。

This course is a basic course for the use of Autodesk Maya. It guides students to make 3D character models from 2D concept arts and the models can be animated by animators in animation production. In addition to the character design and software using, it also includes the understanding of biological muscles and skeletons and the knowledge of 3D topology.
